sections.title: Summary
sections.content: Web application developer skilled in full-stack development, automation, and software testing, with a background in Business Administration. Focused on delivering efficient solutions for business services and technology consulting. Known for resilience, responsibility, and commitment to continuous learning. English proficiency: B2.

content.title: ONE (Oracle Next Education) Program - Backend (Java, Spring, and AI)
items: Specialization in Java and Spring Boot development, with a focus on applying Artificial Intelligence in applications.

content.title: Java Backend Development
items: Selected in the top 2% out of 2,000+ applicants.
Completed 400+ hours of training in backend development with Java, Spring Boot and databases.

content.title: Bachelor in Administration
content.institution: National University of Trujillo, Trujillo, PE

content.title: Programming Assistant - Internship
items: Implemented robust business logic and developed scalable REST services using Spring Boot and Oracle Database.
Integrated secure authentication and authorization with JWT to protect APIs.
Deployed and configured applications on AWS using services like EC2 and RDS.
Technologies used: Java, Spring Boot, REST APIs, JWT, Oracle Database, AWS (EC2, RDS).

content.title: Urbania - Real estate sales platform
items: Front end role.
Developed an interactive WebApp for managing real estate transactions with a focus on user experience.
Technologies used: React, JS, Express, Cloudinary, MongoDB

content.title: MasCercaTuyo - Service Marketplace
items: Full Stack role.
Created a WebApp connecting service providers with nearby customers using geolocation and maps.
Technologies used: React, Spring Boot, Java, MySQL.

content.title: Reviews and Recommendations Platform (Spring Boot)
items: Developed a backend application with Spring Boot for managing reviews and recommendations.
Implemented authentication and authorization with Spring Security and OAuth2 for social login.
Built dynamic user interfaces using JSP.
Collaborated in an agile Scrum team, participating in sprints and planning meetings.
Technologies used: Spring Boot, Spring Security, OAuth2, JSP, MySQL.

content.frameworks: Spring Boot, Spring Security, JSP, React, Angular

sections.title: Certifications
items: ISTQB Certified Tester
Selenium WebDriver

sections.title: Experiencia
items: 5+ años desarrollando aplicaciones web
Experto en React, Node.js y MongoDB
